item.title: How to make wild counter say things
item.dc:creator: @chris_lol chris lol
item.description:
@chris_lol wrote:

okay so down where the wild level counter is, im trying to make it say “W I L D” if your in the wilderness and “S A F E” if your in safezone. so far i have this,

checkwildy2(); if(inwildy2) { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@ W I L D", 199); } else { outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@ S A F E", 199); } }

but when ur in safe zone, it still says wild… help pl0x

Read full topic
item.source: How to make wild counter say things
